name: True Love For Her
storyline:
The protagonist you play as is Kurai Hana, a young high schooler. Since her early years, she has never interacted with any friends in school, leading her to believe that she is like a non-existent ghost due to the lack of interaction with other kids. However, when she starts high school, things remain the same until one day when she accidentally crashes into a person, a girl named Delena. Over four months of talking to Delena, everything changes for Kurai Hana as she begins to realize she’s no longer a ghost.

One day, while walking through the school corridors, Kurai Hana witnesses people bullying Delena. Now, her objective is to get rid of these horrible individuals each week until she can confess her love to Delena without any distractions between them.
summary: True Love For Her (TLFH) is a Yandere game inspired by Yandere Simulator and Life Is Strange that doesn’t compete with the original games. This game involves murder and other methods of killing, so it is not suitable for kids. We are not responsible for any actions taken by kids replicating activities from TLFH in real life.
